price: 40. Waxayna (wax badan) soo ag mareen magaaladii (Sodom) ee lagu halaagay roobka xun. Ee miyaanay ku arag (indhahooda)? Mayee waxaanay rajeyneyn in la soo bixin doono iyagoo nool dhimasho kaddib (oo la xisaabin)18.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَتَوۡاْ عَلَى ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُمۡطِرَتۡ مَطَرَ ٱلسَّوۡءِۚ أَفَلَمۡ يَكُونُواْ يَرَوۡنَهَاۚ بَلۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَرۡجُونَ نُشُورٗا
footnotes: 18. Marka kama ayan faa’ideysan oo kuma ay cibrad qaadan casharradii dadkii hore ee tagey iyo wixii ku dhacay.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ataw ʿalā al-qaryati allatī um'ṭirat maṭara al-sawi afalam yakūnū yarawnahā bal kānū lā yarjūna nushūran
